title: Customer Service Manager for Airbnb and Booking.com
job_overview:
Virtual Assistant (Google Sheets + Customer Service) – Part-Time ? Full-Time
We are a dynamic travel company looking for a highly organized and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to join our team.

This is a long-term role that begins as part-time (80%) and transitions to full-time from December to May during our peak season.

???? Role Overview
You will support our operations with:

Advanced Google Sheets management: formulas, dashboards

Creating and maintaining organized reports and trackers

Handling basic customer support via email, WhatsApp, and chat

Following up with internal teams and keeping things on track

???? Job Details
Start Date: Immediate

Workload:
• Until November: ~30–35 hours/week (80%)
• December to May: Full-time (40–45 hours/week)

Salary: $600/month

Working hours: Some overlap with Israel timezone (UTC+3) required

Long-term commitment only – we’re building a team for the future

? Requirements
Proven experience with Google Sheets (QUERY, ARRAYFORMULA, dashboards, data validation)

Strong English writing and communication skills

Extremely organized, structured, and process-driven

Ability to follow instructions and work independently

Fast learner, proactive mindset

???? Bonus Points (Not Mandatory)
Experience in customer support (email/chat/WhatsApp)

Familiar with CRMs or project tools (e.g. Trello, Slack, HubSpot)

Previous work in travel or service-related roles
